Title: Chinese Algebra
Writer: Sean Conway, Chad Feehan, Ann Biderman (created by), Miki Johnson (story editor), David Sonnenborn (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray's latest attempt to save Avi and square his debts to the mob takes a hit when FBI agent Frank Barnes becomes involved.
